name: Robin
text: Hey Wanderer, where are you off to this time around?

name: Wanderer
text: A teribble thing has happened while you were away...

name: Wanderer
text: Our village was ravaged by "Goshann the Wizard" and he has kidnapped your wife, Ivette.

name: Wanderer
text: I heard a rumor that "Goshann the Wizard" is headed to his lair, up at Duskmoor...

name: Wanderer
text: Your wife and all the others he took away will be there. Hurry!

name: Robin
text: I vow to liberate my darling, Ivette, and other villagers captivated by that old bastard...
